Comment: Why should they care? They're all rich, mostly white people who occasionally try to do something good but will be fine no matter what happens. You're as dumb as the MAGAs if you think they're going to, or are even supposed to, fight for you when you won't fight for yourself.  Edit to directly address what you said in clear terms: "The democrats are the opposition party. So by definition they do need to do something. Thatâ€™s the whole point of them. Otherwise they serve no purpose." Have you seen them do much in the way of meaningful opposition? The point of the current Democratic Party is to protect corporate interests, and while the corpos are displeased by the wanton chaos of the Trump admin, they seem to be fine playing the waiting game/placating Trump to get exemptions. The Democrats are serving their purpose just fine, it's simply that you dont' understand what their purpose is. And they get to cater to corpos because voters are too unengaged to realize they should primary the old neo-liberals running the show to get new blood into the party, and so it all circles back to the voters. This Democratic Party is the one the voters voted for. This President of the United States is the one the voters voted for. They did not walk in their on their own, the voters put them there. Fool the voters once, shame on the politician; fool the voters for 30 - 50 years (depending on party), that's on the voter.
